title: Pokemon Legends: Arceus is Incredible!? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 01.24.22
description:
Blessing and Tim start the week with a JAM PACKED news day! Let's talk about Pokemon Legends: Arceus early impressions, a mystery kirby game, Elden Ring going gold, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:03:00 - Housekeeping
A new episode of PS I Love You XOXO is recording later today on Patreon. We’re gonna be talking about the PlayStation side of the Activision-Blizzard acquisition and asking Will Xbox Game Pass ever come to PlayStation? You can catch that later live on Patreon or when it goes up tomorrow for everyone on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames and on podcast services around the globe.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: James Davis (@JamesDavisMakes), Black Jack, & Pranksy
The Roper Report  -
00:05:12 - Pokemon Legends Arceus is apparently really good?? - Chris Scullion @ VGC
00:19:05 - An unannounced Kirby game has been seemingly teased in a Japanese magazine? - Jordan Middler @ VGC
00:22:36 - Elden Ring has gone gold!
00:25:13 - More for Edlen Ring: From Software says Elden Ring can be completed in around 30 hours - Tom Ivan @ VGC
00:26:30 - Ad
00:28:48 - Unity acquires Ziva Dynamics - Chris Kerr @ GameDeveloper
00:36:30 - Yakuza creator Toshihiro Nagoshi and NetEase have formed new studio - Marie Dealessandri @ GiBiz
00:41:08 - Sony Pictures Classics Picks Up Alex Helfrecht Animated Movie ‘A Winter’s Journey’ - Anthony D'alessandro @ Deadline
00:47:35 - Out today
ONE OF THEM ROTATIN’ SEGMENTS: It’s episode 1100!
00:49:19 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Whitta
itunes:author: Kinda Funny
